title: Grant IdM permissions to newly-created suite admin users
content:
The newly-created suite admin users don't have the permission to access IdM Admin Portal (https://<External_Access_Host>/idm-admin), to grant IdM permissions to them:

  1. Log in to IdM Admin Portal as "suite-admin".
  2. Click SYSBO organization from the organization list.
  3. From the Groups tab, click the administrators group, and then click   on the top-right menu to edit it.
  4. In the Users section, add those users who need the IdM permissions as Associated Users, click SAVE.
